text.en: Hearing your name, O Bhagavān Amitāyus,
text.en-trans: gang tsen töpé dümin chiwé pung

text.en: Instantly destroys the armies of maras who bring untimely death.
In you I take refuge! To you I pray from the depth of my heart:
text.en-trans: khyé la kyab chi nying né solwa deb

text.en: Bless me, so I may attain supreme vajra-like longevity!
text.en-trans: dorjé tsé chok drubpar jingyi lob
